duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and inspire team members to drive branch profitability and accomplish set goals.
Exercise judgment in decision-making within company policy guidelines and oversight.
Serve as a subject matter expert on personal loan products, providing solutions to customers' financial needs.
Maintain branch operations solvency by controlling assets, credit extension, and counseling past-due customers.
Develop and maintain customer relationships, deliver exceptional service, and manage complaints.
Oversee various branch duties including loan approval, collection activities, insurance claims processing, reporting, and expense management.
Address branch staffing needs in partnership with recruiting and district supervisors.
Cultivate and maintain relationships with local retail businesses, handling complaints and providing training on company policies and procedures.
Complete other assigned duties by leadership.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or Equivalent and 2 years of management experience or completion of required Management Trainee program. Valid Driver’s License and access to a dependable automobile with liability insurance coverage.
Preferred: 1+ years of Consumer Finance experience and willingness to relocate for career advancement.
